content: fast easy pattern to make baby yoda aka the child for your favorite child or your inner child the top of the bassinet fits snugly over the bottom like an egg this works up super quick with only the tiniest bit of sewing make one for an easter basket gift or christmas tree ornament see my video tutorial for this pattern here https //youtu be/aiw_hwenw9y tools and materials you will need --worsted weight yarn in light green light brown brown and light gray -- 2 6mm black plastic safety eyes --stuffing about 1 handful --e and f hooks --scissors --large-headed pins --large-eyed blunt darning needle --stitch marker such as 3 inches of contrasting yarn or a safety pin
